card.name: A Good Bit Laid By
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you receive mp for Hoard Gathering or you have stored at least 3 major items at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. Your unique Dwarf characters which normally have 2 mind gain 1 mind and are worth 1 mp (to a maximum of 5 extra character points).

card.name: A More or Less Decent Giant
card.graphics: A More or Less Decent Giant.jpg
card.text: Giant. Playable at any non-Haven [H], non- Dark-hold [D] site in High Pass or a mountain region, with a company containing a diplomat (even if the site is tapped). For non-combat purposes his base prowess in considered to be 10. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: A New Domain
card.text: Balrog specific. Playable during the site phase on a site where you have played Lord and Usurper. The site becomes one of your Dark-havens [K]. Additionally, Growing Shadow may be played on any of the regions adjacent to the site's region, regardless of any other requirements. Cannot be dublicated on a given site.

card.name: All This Dwarvish Racket
card.text: Each moving company containing a majority of Dwarves has its hazard limit increased by half the number of Dwarves in the company (round down fractions). Additionally, if Doors of Night is in play, the hazard player may draw an additional card for each Dwarf with a mind less than 5 in a moving company. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Amon Lanc
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. As a short-event, playable at Dol Guldur during the site phase. If a minion company is at this site, CvCC is initiated and cannot be cancelled. Additionally, you may tap a Dwarf or sage to search your play deck or discard pile for one of the following cards: Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, Return to Old Dwellings or any manifestation of Thraín II. As a permanent-event, playable on Dol Guldur if Return to Old Dwellings is played on the site. All versions of Dol Guldur become a Border-hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold. Discard this card if Dol Guldur leaves active play.

card.name: An Evil Fortune
card.text: Balrog specific. You may play Breach the Hold on any Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] with a Dwarf-hold surface site (as if at The Rusted-deeps). Additionally, you may play Invade Their Domain on any Dwarf-hold (as if on Iron Hill Dwarf-hold), if its adjacent Under-deeps site has Breach the Hold played on it. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Arda Angered
card.text: Each Pûkel-creature, Rock Fall, and Lava Flow attack has its prowess and strikes increased by 1 (by 2 if Doors of Night is in play). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: At Your Service!
card.text: Dwarf only. One influence check by a Dwarf is modified by adding half his mind value (round up). Any negative modifications for his race or type are cancelled. If the check is successful you may remove one hazard permanent-event from the influencing character.

card.name: Attack-lord
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. +2 EI against Dwarves with a lower prowess and mind. + 1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls and Drakes. tap: give +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company against one attack (or in CvCC). Cannot be duplicated by a given player unless he has Folk of Durin in play.

card.name: Attercop! Attercop!
card.text: Song. Playable on a Hobbit facing a strike from a Wolf, Spider or Animal attack. -5 to the strike's prowess. tIf untapped after this strike he may tap to face a second strike. If the strike is successful, the resulting body check is modified by +1.

card.name: Balin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Balin. Longbeard. Leader. +3 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. If you have Reconquest of Khazad-dûm in play, you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Balin, Dwarf of All Trades
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if heis in play. If on Balin: tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take any skill card, which Balin could use, from your play deck to your hand. tap: during your organization phase to look at 3 random cards from your opponent's hand. If any of these cards is a creature playable keyed to your current site or region you may put the card to the bottom of opponent's play deck.

attr.value: Dwarves -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies that do not contain Elves)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage when this site card is revelaed to move there. A Dwarf at this site may discard a Lost Knowledge he controls to make hoard items playable at this site until the end of turn. Petty-dwarves faction may be played at this site.
Dwarves -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies that do not contain Elves)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage when this site card is revelaed to move there. A Dwarf at this site may discard a Lost Knowledge he controls to make hoard items playable at this site until the end of turn. Petty-dwarves faction may be played at this site.

Durang is playable at this site (as if at an Under-deeps site). Reforging may be played at this site by a Dwarf sage (as if Information were playable). Both these resources may be stored here (as if at a Haven [H]).
Items (minor*, major*, gold ring) * --battle-gear items only--

Once per turn, a Dwarf or sage in a covert company at this site may tap to shuffle one item with the word 'Dwarf' or 'Dwarven' in its card text or title from your discard pile or sideboard into your play deck (tap the site if untapped).

card.name: Battle-axe of the Fallen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Ruins of Belegost or Ruins of Nogrod if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Weapon. Axe. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 9. Dwarf only: +5 prowess against Spawn, Dragons and Drakes (to a maximum of 11). Dwarf-leader or Firebeard only: double the effects of The Dwarves are upon you! for Firebeard Dwarves in the company.

card.name: Bears of the Carrock
card.text: Unique. Playable at Beorn's House or The Carrock if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Sprautabern or a character with home site Beorn's House (+3), Beornings (+2). Rotate this card 90° (or place a token) if you play Beorning Skin-changers as a creature, or to cancel Beorning Skin-changers if played against any of your companies. This faction is worth 1 extra mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 4).

card.name: Behind Doors of Stone
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf-hold, if you discard (for no effect) a Technology item stored at or played on the site. Opponent’s companies may not enter any version of this site; agents may not move to the site. Factions you have in play at this site are never worth more than 1 mp. Additionally, the roll to move between the site and any of its adjacent Under-deeps sites is (13). Breach the Hold may be played at any of those sites (discard this card if played successfully).Any opponent may tap 3 characters or an avatar at the site to discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Bilbo's Magic Ring
card.text: Unique. Ring. Manifestation of The One Ring. Playable only with a Gold Ring after a test result of 10 or more (+2 if tested at a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D], -2 if tested at a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]). May be used to satisfy the conditions of any manifestation of Gollum, Gollum's Fate, or The Precious. +3 prowess (up to double the normal prowess), +3 body (to a maximum of 10). +3 to EI. Bearer may make a CC modified by -1 to cancel a strike (except from Undead and Nazgul attacks). +1 CP to every character in the company. May be tested as a gold ring item. If the result is: 7 or 8, nothing happens; 9 or greater, The One Ring may be played; 6 or less, discard this card.

attr.value: Dwarf-lord specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven. If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold as their home site may be brought into play under GI at this site, even if your Dwarf-lord is in play and not here.

card.name: Bolg of the North
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Bolg. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +3 EI against Orcs. +1 prowess against Dwarves and Elves. When Bolg of the North is at Mount Gundabad you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand, and all attacks keyed to Mount Gundabad against his company are detainment. His EI is reduced by 2 if there is a manifestation of the The Witch-king or of Lieutenant of Angmar in play.

card.name: Bolg, Son of Azog
card.text: Unique. Orc. Manifestation of Bolg. 1 strike. May be played keyed to The Under-leas, and to Gundabad, Dragon-gap and sites in these regions. May also be keyed to Angmar, Forovirkain, Grey Mountain Narrows, Grey Mountains, Misty Mountains Northern Spur, Northern Rhovanion and to sites in these regions if the company has faced a Wolf attack the same turn. One strike must always be assigned to the highest mind Dwarf in the company.

card.name: Borin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. Wound Borin to cancel a Trap-attack (no body check is required; all strikes are considered defeated).

card.name: Born under the Mountains
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. All your mp sources at Under-deeps sites count for the purpose of calling your Day of Reckoning. Any Under-deeps movement roll for your companies moving to a site where a minion company is present is automatically successful. You may discard this card (at any time) to cancel a Rock Fall attack, or to give all Dwarves at an Under-deeps site +2 prowess in CvCC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Call of the Deeps
card.text: Playable on a company containing a majority of Dwarves and a treasure or greater item, which is moving to a non-Dwarf-hold, non-Under-deeps site. Opponent must replace the company's new site with a site from his site deck that is an Under-deeps site or surface site. The company must be able to legally move to this site.

card.name: Carc
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Playable at any tapped or untapped site in Northern Rhovanion. tap: cancel a strike against himself from a non-automatic-attack. Discard Carc to allow Information to be played at any Border-hold [B] site in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Iron Hills or Dorwinion.

card.name: Children of Aulë
card.text: All Dwarves in play gain +1 body. Additionally, any Under-deeps movement rolls for companies containing a Dwarf is modified by +2. Cannot not be duplicated.

card.name: Clad for War
card.text: All your battle-gear items are worth full mp if you have at least 3 of the 4 types of battle-gear items (weapon, shield, armor and helmet) in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Clad in Chain-shirts
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf-leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI and +1 body to all Dwarves in his company. +2 prowess for every character facing a strike which weapons do not modify. You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase.

card.name: Clan Bonds
card.text: Dwarf characters (even agents) may be brought into play at any Dwarf-hold where one of your companies is present. Additionally, Balrog of Moria is considered an at home Dragon manifestation for the purpose of playing and interpreting Legendary Hoard.

card.name: Crimson Hood
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. +2 EI against Dwarves. Balin may use Pipe as if he were Gandalf.

card.name: Crystals of Bilak-Khald
card.text: Ore. Playable during the site phase at Mines of Falek-dim or the Sulfer-deeps, on a Dwarf or a Goblin- miner. Tap the character. While on target character, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than 5 target character must make a body check modified by +2. If bearer is at a Haven [H,K], he or a sage in the company may tap to place this card with a Dwarven Light-stone or Goblin Earth-plumb; any bonus the item gives is doubled. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Crossing the Border
card.text: Playable on a company that is not moving. The company faces an attack that is an exact copy of one automatic-attack of a site in the same or an adjacent region or of an adjacent Under-deeps site (attacker’s choice).

card.name: Dáin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Dáin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 prowess against Orcs, + 1 prowess against Trolls, Drakes and Dragons. +2 EI against Dwarves and Men. If you are Dáin, all Man factions playable at sites in Wilderland are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him it is worth full mp, and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. -3 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Dawn Comes Early
card.text: Environment. Playable on a Troll if Gates of Morning, The Sun Shone Fiercely or Sun is in play. Troll must make a body check modified by +1 (-1 if he is an Olog-hai or a Half-troll). Failing this check wounds him if unwounded and eliminates him if already wounded (treat a discard result as failing).

card.name: Dawn Take You All!
card.text: Ritual. Playable during CvCC on an untapped sage in a company at a non-Underdeeps site or surface siteC, if Gates of Morning is in play. Tap the sage. All Trolls at the same site are immediately wounded; Half-trolls and Olog-hai are not wounded but receive -2 prowess instead until the end of the turn. Sage makes a CC modified by -2.

card.name: Deep Mountain Fortress
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable during the site phase on an Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R] with a surface site that is not a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company faces an attack: Drake -- 2 strikes with 13 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tatap your Dwarf-lord or discard this card. The site becomes one of your Lord-havens [H] and a Dwarf-hold and loses all automatic-attacks. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. If one of your companies is at this site all attacks against it are cancelled. All other versions gain an additional automatic-attack: Dwarves -- 4 strikes with 8 prowess. Opponents may play Breach the Hold at any version of the affected site; discard both if played successfully. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Desperate Strike
card.text: Warrior only. +4 prowess and -2 body against a strike; -1 to warrior’s body. Cannot be played on a wounded character. After the attack, wound the character if not wounded (no body check is required).

card.name: Dís
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. May not be among the starting characters. +4 EI against Fíli, Frerin, Kíli, Thorin II and Thráin II. If she is at a Dwarf- hold during the organization phase, you may discard Dís and replace her with a manifestation of Fíli, Frerin, Kíli, Thorin II, or Thráin II; the character may be taken from hand, discard pile, or play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Dry Tunnels
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company using Under-deeps movement. River cannot be played on the company’'s new site. Additionally, when The Way is Shut affects the company make a roll: if result is greater than 7 the effects are cancelled. The Reach of Ulmo cancels any ongoing effect of this card.

card.name: Durang
card.text: Ore. Playable at any Under-deeps site on a Dwarf- miner or Goblin- miner (or on any Dwarf or Orc bearing Miner’s Pick). Discard this card to make Dark Forges playable at an Orc-hold or Reforging playable at a Dwarf-hold (as if Information were playable at the site).

card.name: Durin's Crown
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Treasure. Playable at a Dragon’s Lair if a hazard manifestation of the corresponding Dragon is in play, or at Moria if a manifestation of the Balrog of Moria is in play. +1 to body. If borne by a non-Dwarf character, bearer must face an attack by a Dwarf character at the same site (opponent's choice) during his organization phase. Place a stored Reforging with this item to "restore" it. If restored: values in parenthesis apply. tap: during your organisation phase if bearer is at a Free-Hold [F], Border-Hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R] to bring a Dwarf character into play under bearer's EI. Character may come from your hand or discard pile. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Durin's Day
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on one of your Dwarf-characters if he is the highest mind Dwarf in play. Return this card to your hand if a Dwarf with a higher mind enters play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Dragon-lore, Dwarven Hoard, or An Unexpected Party from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: Hidden Site. Unless the company contains a Dwarf, it must discard a Lost Knowledge card it controls to reveal this site. Tap a character at this site to take one Ancient Stair, Legendary Stair, or The Iron-pit from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Dwarf-chopper
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Axe. Playable at Deep-cleft or any non-Darkhaven [K] Under-deeps site. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 against Dwarves to a maximum of 10). Leader only: +2 EI against Orcs. Hurog only: tap: face a Dwarf-attack as if he were a single character company.

card.name: Dwarf-friend
card.text: Playable on a non-Wizard, non-Ringwraith, non-Dwarf, non-overt character at a Dwarf-hold. Target character receives +2 EI against Dwarves and suffers no negative modifications according to his race when attempting to influence Dwarf factions. Additionally, target character is considered a Dwarf for non- environment and non-item effects or cards. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Dwarven Alchemist
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf sage or a Dwarf with a mind of six or more at a Dwarf-hold. Target character gains the sage skill. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. tap: and tap target character during the organization phase at an untapped Dwarf-hold to play one technology special item with a character at the site. Recipient need not tap to receive this item and it may be taken from your discard pile or hand. Tap the site.

card.name: Dwarven Armoury
card.text: Playable if you have at least 2 Dwarf characters in play. Place up to 3 of the following items under this card from your hand, sideboard or discard pile when you play this card: Dwarven Chain-shirt, Miner's Pick, or Shield of Iron-bound Ash. If any of your companies is at a Dwarf-hold you may discard this card to play these items with the company (you need not tap these characters or the site).

card.name: Dwarven Art of War
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dwarf-leader during the organization phase. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI: +1 to CC mady by Dwarves in his company bearing a battle-gear item (+2 if a hoard item). You may return this card to your hand during any organization phase.

card.name: Dwarven Chain-shirt
card.text: Armor. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where you have succesfully influenced a Dwarf faction or brought into play a Dwarf character this turn. May also be played during the organization phase (tap the site if untapped). +1 body to a maximum of 8.

card.name: Dwarven Cunning
card.text: Playable as a permanent-event on a site during the site phase, if your opponent is not of the same alignment. Tap a Dwarf in the company and face all of the site's automatic-attacks again (including any modifications). Any other player's companies face an attack (after facing any automatic-attacks) at the site: Traps -- 3 strikes wih 9 prowess. The site is not discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card after the attack is faced. Alternatively, playable as a short-event: tap a Dwarf to cancel a Trap-attack against his company or to discard Concealed Entrance at his site.

card.name: Dwarven Fire
card.text: Technology. Playable by a Dwarf sage at a tapped or untapped Dwarf-hold. If stored, you may discard this item at any time to create an additional automatic-attack this turn at any version of a Dwarf-hold site you have in active play: Lava Flow - 3 strikes with 9 prowess. Body checks for characters that do not bear any armor, helmet or shield are modified by +1. Only one Dwarven Fire may be so discarded on a given turn.

card.name: Dwarven Heirlooms
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. You may play a hoard minor item with a company at a Dwarf-hold after the successful play of a resource that taps the site (instead of a normal minor item). Additionally, if this is one of your starting stage cards, your starting minor items may be non-unique hoard minor items.

card.name: Dwarven Miner
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. -1 to all of his CC. -1 to his influence attempts. +1 to all rolls required for his company to move to adjacent Under-deeps sites. Cannot be duplicated on a company that does not contain a manifestation of a Dwarf-lord.

card.name: Dwarven Warparty
card.text: Dwarves. 3 strikes (detainment against hero companies). May be played keyed to Angmar, Forochel, Grey Mountains, Grey Mountain Narrows, Gundabad, High Pass, Iron Hills, Northern Rhovanion, Númeriador, Redhorn Gate, or Withered Heath and to non-Dark-hold [D], non-Shadow- hold [S] sites in these regions. May also be keyed to any Dwarf-hold. If Gates of Morning is in play, may also be keyed to any Under-deeps site with a surface a site in the above regionsIf Doors of Night is in play, this becomes a normal attack against hero companies that do not contain a Dwarf.

card.name: Dwarven Axe
card.text: Weapon. Warrior only. +2 prowess (to a maximum of 7); +3 prowess if held by a Dwarf (to a maximum of 8). If bearer is a minion or overt character, this item gives 3 CP.

card.name: Dwarven Galleries
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have 5 SP or more. Your stored To the Uttermost Foundations are each worth 2 mp. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Dry Tunnels, Gnawed Ways, Into Dark Tunnels, New Tunnels, or Secret Ways from your discard pile or play deck (reshuffle) to your hand. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Dworin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 EI against Dwarves.+2 prowess against Orcs. tap: prevent Old Grudge from being discarded from play.

card.name: Eagles Ahunt
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Eagle-watch. Flying. +2 prowess against characters and allies with Flying ability. Each overt company moving through Anduin Vales, Misty Mountains, High Pass or Redhorn Gap faces an attack: Animals. Eagles -- each character faces a strike. If Gates of Morning is in play this attack also affects Dunland, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen and Grey Mountain Narrows. Unless this attack is defeated, any character in a company facing an attack from Eagles Ahunt cannot use cards requiring scout skill this turn and any ongoing effects of such cards are cancelled.

attr.value: Dorwinion, Horse Plains, Sea of Rhûn, Southern Rhovanion

card.name: Expert Treasure-hunter
card.text: Hobbit. 1 strike. +3 prowess against Dragon characters. Attacker chooses defending character; all strikes of Expert Treasure-hunter must target the same character. May be played following a non-detainment Dwarf creature attack or at any version of a site where a hero company with a Dwarf majority is present. Make a roll for each successfull strike instead of a body check (characters are not harmed): discard an item from the company (or stored at the site) with a random number closest to the roll (opponent's choice if tied).

card.name: Fear of Kin
card.text: Playable on a Dwarven Ring or a greater item borne by a Dwarf-lord, if he has at least 7 P. Item gives 2 less CP (toa minimum of 1) and cannot be transferred. At the beginning of the organization phase, make a roll and add the Dwarf-lord's mind. If the result is greater than his P, the Dwarf with the highest mind in his company (other than the Dwarf-lord) and any of his followers must leave the Dwarf-lord's company and move to another site. If there are no non-follower Dwarves in his company, the company must move. Cannot be duplicated on an item. Discard when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Floi
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his influence attempts. May tap to support a character in his company even if he is assigned a strike from the same attack.

card.name: Flooded to the Surface
card.text: Playable on an Under-deeps surface site if The Reach of Ulmo is in play. The site gains an additional automatic-attack which is an exact duplicate of the first automatic-attack of the adjacent Under-deeps site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Folk of Durin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable at a tapped or untapped Moria if Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is in play, or at Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is in play at the site and if the influence check is greater than 14. Standard Modifications: Lord of Dwarrowdelf Dwarf (+5), Longbeard Dwarf (+2)

card.name: Fortress Reclaimed
card.text: Playable on a site if Rebuild the Town or Hold Rebuild and Repaired is played on it. This card overrides any conflicting hazardor resource. You may play here a non-Dragon, non-animal faction normally playable at a site in the region where target site is located (or adjacent region); the influence attempt is modified by -2. If you have played a faction at this site an additional automatic-attack is created against other player’s companies: same type as the faction -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company is of the same alignment). Discard this card if Tempest of Fire is played on the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Foundations of the Hoard
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. Playable on Thráin. You suffer no reduction in item mp at the end of the game if these are more than half of your mp total. Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring Thráin bears to satisfy the hoard requirement for any items played with his company this turn. Thráin makes a CP.

card.name: Frár
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. +1 to his company's Under- deeps movement rolls.

card.name: Frerin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against the Blue Mountain Dwarves faction. Any non-stage resource playable on a manifestation of Thorin II may also be played on Frerin, if no manifestation of Thorin II is in play.

card.name: Friendship of Old Renewed
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Playable during the site phase on Dáin at Thranduil's Halls. Dáin makes a CC modified by -3. Afterwards, tap Dáin and make an influence check (considered against an Elf character), modified by +3 if you have Wood-elves in play. If the result is less than 14 discard this card. Otherwise this card is worth 1 item mp for each of your unique factions in play (to a maximum of 4).

card.name: Fungi
card.text: Food item. Playable by a Dwarf or Orc at any tapped or untapped non-Dark-hold [D] Under-deeps site. If the company moves with Under-deeps movement, discard Fungi at the end of the movement/hazard phase to take another movement/hazard phase; you may untap one character in the company.

card.name: Galion
card.text: Unique. Silvan. tap: bring one Old Winyards from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Gandalf's Staff
card.text: Unique. Playable on a staff borne by Gandalf. Discard if the staff is not borne by Gandalf. Gandalf makes a CP when this card taps. tap: at the end of the organization phase to reduce the hazard limit for Gandalf's company by 1 (to a minimum of 2) if moving to a new site this turn. tap: at any time to give +2 to Gandalf's prowess and body against a strike.

attr.value: Ancient Dwarf-ruin. After you have successfully played Tower Raided on this site, you may take one Fortress Reclaimed or Rebuild the Town from your sideboard to your hand.
Orcs -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against overt companies);

AAncient Dwarf-ruin. Non-Nazgûl creatures attack normally at this site, not as detainment. During the site phase, an Orc leader at the site may tap to discard one Profitable Trade in play with factions in Wilderland (factions remain in play).

card.name: Gimli's Axe
card.text: Unique. Playable on a Dwarven Axe borne by Gimli. +1 to Gimli's prowess. You may always assign strikes to Gimli regardless of his status. Discard if the Dwarven Axe is not borne by Gimli.

card.name: Gimli, Son of Gloin
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. Manifestation of Gimli. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 prowess when Hunting Orcs is in play (+2 if an Elf is in his company).

card.name: Glades of Flowering Stone
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on The Gem-deeps, if a Dwarf-lord is there and you have Aglarond in play. You may store Dwarf-characters at The Gem-deeps (yielding no mp). This card is worth 1 faction mp for every 2 Dwarves stored there (to a maximum of 3). The Gem-deeps is not discarded or returned to the location deck while there is a Dwarf stored there. Every mp this card is worth reduces prowess and strikes of automatic-attacks and attacks keyed to the site by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Goblin-basher
card.text: Unique. Grey Agent. Manifestation of Beorn. +2 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CC. Agent only: may attack an overt company at a Shadow-hold [S] (attack is not detainment). If an Orc, Wolf or Animal hazard creature is played on a company at or moving to a site in his current or adjacent region you may automatically transfer him to this site (even if you have the site in active play).

card.name: Gollum's Cave
card.text: Playable on a (grey) agent at an Under-deeps surface site. The agent may use Under-deeps movement (as an agent action; no movement roll required). If target agent is My Precious, he receives +2 prowess while at an Under-deeps site. If this card is in your discard pile, you may play it as if it were in your hand.

card.name: Great Achievement
card.text: Place this card on your avatar if he is in play. All cards that could be stored at a Haven [H] can be stored at one of your Havens. If on your avatar one of the following cards is worth full mp if played successfully (then place this card with it for 1 mp): Clean the Greenwood, Fate of the Ithil-stone, Into the Smoking Cone, King under the Mountain, Reconquest of Khazad-dûm, Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur, The Wood of Greenleaves, Towers Destroyed, or Tower Raided. Cannot be duplicated for each of these cards.

card.name: Great Miners
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable if you have at least5 P. You may play Delver's Harvest and Earth- eater at any of your Under-deeps Dwarf-holds. Additionally, you receive full mp for Mithril, Map to Mithril, The Arkenstone, Gems of Arda, Vein of Arda or any other Ore card. This card is worth 2 mp if you have at least 3 different of these cards in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Halls of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable during the site phase on Moria, if you have Return to Khazad-dûm is in play and the company contains a majority of Dwarves. The company faces 3 attacks (cannot be cancelled): Orcs -- 5 strikes with 8 prowess; Orcs -- 3 strikes with 11 prowess; Troll -- 1 strike with 14 prowess; Following the attacks, tap a Dwarf with mind 5 or greater or discard this card. Discard any Invade Their Domain played on Moria. Moria becomes a Border-hold [B] and loses its Orc automatic- attacks. A Balrog player may play Invade their Domain on Moria (none of the attacks may be cancelled). If successfully played this card is discarded.Discard if the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Hard to Tame
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a treasure or ring special item borne by a Dwarf. The item gives two fewer corruption points (to a minimum of one). The hazard player may tap this card (costing one against the hazard limit) to take one Greed, Covetous Thoughts, or Grasping and Ungracious from his discard pile to his hand. Covetous Thoughts may be played on any Dwarf in the company (except the bearer of target item). Discard this card if there are no Dwarves in the company. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Hermit Troll
card.text: Troll. 1 strike. May also be played keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R] that has at least two Wildernesses [w] or one Desert [e] in its site path.

card.name: His Beard Long and Forked
card.text: Playable on a Dwarf character with a mind of 5 or more (4 or more if a Longbeard). Target character becomes a leader and may tap to untap a Dwarf in his company. You may start the game with this card in lieu of a minor item.

card.name: Hoard Gathering
card.text: Choose one of the following types when you play this card: hoard, ore, ring or treasure. If you have stored at least three different resources of the chosen type, this card is worth a third of the normal mp total of these stored resources (round down any fractions; to a minimum of 1; each stored resource may count only towards one copy of this card). This card is worth full mp to a Dwarf-lord player.

card.name: Hunting Orcs
card.text: Each player may take a Wondrous Maps from his discard pile or sideboard to hand during the end-of-turn phase. Additionally, Wondrous Maps can be played if the last region is a Dark-domain [d] or a Wilderness [w]. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Hurling Rocks
card.text: Any company moving through a mountain region or through High Pass, Redhorn Gate, Bosiri, Cleft of Goats or Narthalf faces an attack: Rock Fall - 2 strikes with 9 prowess. Additionally, Giant hazard creatures may be played keyed to these regions, and also to regions adjacent if Arda Angered is in play.

card.name: Ibûn
card.text: Unique. Undead. Dwarf. 1 strike. May also be keyed to Shadow-land [s] or to an Ancient Dwarf-ruin, on a company that contains a treasure item. May also be played keyed to Bar-en-Ibûn, Cameth Brin and The Worthy Hills.

attr.value: Dwarf-lord specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven. If any of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Iron Hill Dwarf-hold as their home site may be brought into play under GI at this site, even if your Dwarf-lord is in play and not here.

card.name: Ironfists
card.text: Unique. Playable at Nurunkhizdín or Azagarbhun, or at Mount Gundabad if Return to Old Dwellings is played at the site, if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Ironfist Dwarf (+3), Longbeard Dwarf (-3) tap: make a non-unique Ore resource playable at the above named sites this turn.

card.name: Ironfoot
card.text: Unique. Armor. Place this card on a manifestation of Daín II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. If on Dáin: tap: +2 prowess against a strike from an Animal, Orc, or Wolf attack. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to search your play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile for a Leg it Double Quick.

card.name: Jewel-healer
card.text: Playable on a non-warrior or sage Dwarf character at one of your Lord-havens [H] (or in your starting company). The character may tap and tap a jewel or ore resource in the company to heal (from wounded to tapped) one Dwarf in the company. Target Dwarf must make a CC, and the Dwarf so healed must make a body check modified by -2 (before being healed).

card.name: Khazadshathûr
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Playable at Goblin-gate. +2 to body to a maximum of 9. Dwarf only: +1 EI against Dwarves. All dark enchantments targeting bearer are cancelled. tap: give +3 prowess (or +3 to the roll) against a strike for which weapons do not modify or prowess is not used to determine the result.

card.name: King of Seven Houses
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable on your Dwarf-lord at one of your Lord-havens [H] if he bears The One Ring. Only one King of Seven Houses may be played on a given turn. If at a Lord-haven during your end-of-turn phase and bearing The One Ring, opponent may play up to 3 creatures/events that are manifestations of an avatar, which attack your Dwarf-lord as if a single character company (cannot be cancelled); these may be taken from hand, deck or play. If unwounded after these attacks, make a roll: add 1 for each King of the Seven Houses you have in play. If the result is less than 5, your Dwarf-lord is eliminated; if greater than 8, you win the game.

card.name: King Spider
card.text: Spider. Traps. Before resolving the attack opponent must call odds or even. To assign strikes, each character in the company makes a roll: if the result corresponds with opponent's choice, character must face a strike (resolve strike immediately). Attack or strikes of King Spider cannot be cancelled by general card effects (e.g. Ruse), but scouts may tap to cancel a strike they are facing.

card.name: King's Advisor
card.text: 1 prowess against Orcs. Cannot be duplicated on a company that does not contain a Dwarf-lord. tap: take His Beard Long and Forked from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: King's Judge
card.text: +1 EI against Dwarves. +3 EI against Dwarf factions. +1 prowess against Orcs. Cannot be duplicated on a company that does not contain a Dwarf-lord.

card.name: Kingdom of Old Restored
card.text: Playable on a site where you have defeated an at Home Dragon manifestation, or you have Halls of Khazad-dûm or Return to Old Dwellings in play. +4 to your GI. You may take one Hoard Gathering, No Strangers at this Time, or Profitable Trade from your sideboard to your hand when this card is played. The site becomes a Border-hold [B] and the region containing the site a Border-land [b]. During your end-of-turn phase, rotate this card 90° (or place a token); discard this card if it is worth less than -2 mp or if the site is a [R]. This card is worth 1 mp for each time rotated (to a maximum of 8); reduce this card’s mp by the number of factions (and cards played on these) in play at sites in the same territory by any opponent. A Dwarf-lord player receives full mp for this card. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Knowledge of Arda's Treasures
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. Playable on a Dwarf-lord. If the Dwarf-lord bears a Dwarven Ring, it is worth full mp and you may play ore resources at his current non- Haven surface site (if that resource is normally playable at the adjacent Under-deeps site). Additionally, you may tap a Dwarven Ring the Dwarf-lord bears to take one ore resource playable at his current site from your discard pile to your hand. The Dwarf-lord makes a CP modified by +2.

card.name: Kori
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. Grey Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Trolls. Agent only: May use Under-deeps movement. tap: at the beginning of the site phase to create an additional automatic-attack this turn: Traps -- 2 strikes with 9 prowess. tap: during the movement/hazard phase, if at a company's new site, to prevent that company from moving again this turn.

card.name: Last of the Seven
card.text: Thráin specific. As a short-event playable on Thráin if no Dwarven Ring is in play; +2 to his prowess, +1 body, and+2 EI for the rest of the turn, and you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand. Thráin makes a CC modified by -1. As a permanent-event playable on a Dwarven Ring borne by Thráin. -3 mp and -3 CP. Thráin must make a CC during his untap phase for every other Dwarven Ring in play; failing this CC you must discard a character in his company (ignore other effects). Discard if not borne by Thráin. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Lipór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 prowess against Orcs. May play Knowledge of the Enemy at any site if his company has faced an Orc attack the same turn.

card.name: Lock nor Bar May Hinder
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company with a character controlling Rescue Prisoners. You may play one character with the company from hand or discard pile, regardless of the company's current site, presence of an avatar, or the one character per turn limit.

attr.value: Swamp. *Major items are only playable at the site if the company has defeated the automatic-attack or has faced an Undead creature keyed to the site the same turn.
Swamp. *Major items are only playable at the site if the company has faced an Undead creature keyed to the site the same turn.

card.name: Lóni
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to his CP. -1 to his influence attempts. tap: bring one food item from your discard pile to your play deck and shuffle.

card.name: Lord of Dwarrowdelf
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on your Dwarf-lord, if he is at Moria or its adjacent sites and you have 8 P or more. +5 EI against Dwarves. Your Return to Old Dwellings, Halls of Khazad-dûm and Reconquest of Khazad-dûm are each worth full mp (if worth any). Unless a manifestation of Balrog of Moria has been defeated, discard this card if bearer is at a site that is not in Redhorn Gate or its adjacent regions and/or does not have Moria as adjacent site.

card.name: Lord of the Eagles
card.text: Unique. Animal. Flying. Manifestation of Gwaihir. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. As a creature playable keyed to Anduin Vales, High Pass, Misty Mountains, Wold & Foothills, or at sites in these regions. If The Watchful Peace is in play may also be played keyed to Shadow-lands [s] which are adjacent to any of the regions above. May only be played against minion and overt companies. As a short-event, bring one hazard creature marked with an (*) or Eagles Ahunt from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lust for Treasure
card.text: Thranduil of Mirkwood specific. Playable if a ring or treasure item is in play. Reveal a treasure item from your sideboard and place it face down with this card. Opponent then places this card with a Dwarf-hold or site containing a hoard in Wilderland or its adjacent regions. The site card may come from either location deck (opponent's choice) and does not leave active play while the item is placed under it. Any version of the item may be played by any player at any version of the site (as if from hand and at the appropriate site). Keep this card with the item. If the item is stored, this card gives 1 mp to the player who has stored it. Cannot be discarded during the organization phase.

card.name: Mighty Was the Fallen
card.text: Playable on a company if a character from the company worth 2 mp or more was eliminated this turn and removed from the game (except by CC). This card may be stored at one of your Havens [H] for 1 mp. Discard this card if the company contains less than 2 characters. Cannot be duplicated for an eliminated character.

card.name: Miner's Pick
card.text: Weapon. +1 to the company's Under-deeps movement rolls. +1 prowess to a maximum of 4. A Hobbit cannot use this item.

attr.value: Wondrous Maps* (0), Ostigurth (5), The Under-courts (6), The Limestone-caverns (8)
Dwarves - 4 strikes with 10 prowess(detainment if the company contains a Dwarf majority)

Hidden Site. Tap a sage or avatar in the company, or discard a Lost Knowledge card, to reveal this site. Contains a hoard. *Any Wondrous Maps you have in play in Nurn or Horse Plains is considered a surface site of this site. Creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment.
Gaurblog Lug (0), Nurunkhizdín (7), The Rusted-deeps (8), The Sulfur-deeps (7), The Under-courts (8)
(1st) Undead. Dwarves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess(2nd) Opponent may play from hand a creature normally keyable to Shadow-hold [S]

card.name: Mining Settlement
card.text: Dwarf-lord specific. Playable during the site phase on a Ruins & Lairs [R] that is an Ancient-Dwarf-hold or is in a mountain region. The site becomes a Dwarf-hold and one of your Lord-havens [H] and all automatic- attacks are replaced with: Dwarves -- 3 strikes with 9 prowess. Nothing is considered playable as written on the site card. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Other alignments may not use this site as a Haven [H]. Discard this card when the site leaves active play, or when a manifestation of the corresponding Dragon attacks at the stie. It cannot be discarded otherwise. Alternatively, playable on any Dwarf-hold: the site becomes a Protected Lord-haven [H].

card.name: Mithrandir
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Gandalf. Playable on a non-overt company without avatar, if you are a Wizard or Lord with less than 10 P. You may play spells on the company as if on Gandalf (no CC required). Discard this card if Sacrifice of Form is played (place Sacrifice of Form in your mp). Additionally, if the company moves to a Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] opponent must reveal to you 3 hazard cards from his hand (or else his whole hand). Discard when Gandalf enters play or you have 10 or more P. Invert this card during your untap phase; if inverted, discard this card at the end of your turn.

card.name: More Than Meets the Eye
card.text: Dwarf-lord only. If played as a starting stage card, your starting company may include Hobbits. Place this card on your Dwarf-lord if he is in play. +3 EI against Hobbits. You may play To Fealty Sworn at any site after successfully playing a Dwarf faction (as if at a Free-hold [F]). Additionally, during the organization phase you may bring a Hobbit character into play at his home site from your discard pile, if you tap either two Hobbits or four Dwarves in your company at the site. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Mornaugrim
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mines of Angûrath if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+3), overt and hero characters (-3), any one Orc faction in play at a site in Mordor or its adjacent regions (-3). This faction is worth 4 mp if you have a Dwarven Ring in active play. tap: take one Dark Forges, Reforging or The Iron-pit from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Mountaineer
card.text: +1 prowesss against Orcs.-1 to all of his CC.-1 to his influence attempts. Cannot be duplicated on a company that does not contain a Dwarf-lord. tap: at the end of the organization phase to allow his company to move through a mountain region (and not stop at a site therein).

card.name: Náin, Son of Grór
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs. King under the Mountain may be played on him. If he bears a jewel item: +1 to his prowess and body, and -2 to his EI. tap: bring one Songs of the Old from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Náli
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 prowess against Orcs.-1 to all of his CC. -3 to his influence attempts.

card.name: Narin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against the Ironfists faction. If controlling Dwarven Ring of Thélor's Tribe: +1 to all of his CC and he becomes a leader and a sage.

card.name: Naugol
card.text: Dwarves. 3 strikes. +2 prowess against Orcs. Detainment against hero companies. Playable keyed to any Dwarf-hold or site where a Dwarf-lord is present, or to the region containing such site. If played as a long-event: any attacks from Ride against the Enemy and Old Enemies using a Dwarf character or Dwarf faction receive +1 to strikes and prowess and choose defending Orc characters. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Naugrim
card.text: All Dwarf attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 body; Dwarf attacks with no body have 5 body. Discard this card if a Dwarf attack is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: New Tunnels
card.text: Playable on a Deep Mines site or on an Under-deeps Haven [H]. The Way Is Shut does not affect your companies moving to or from this site. At the end of the organization phase, you may reveal for a moving company at this site a Deep Mines (as an adjacent site; the required movement roll is 0). Place this card with the new Deep Mines site, as well as a surface site from your location deck located in the same or an adjacent region as the company's current surface site (or two regions away if you discard from play one Earth-eater). Target Deep Mines need not have a protected Wizardhaven as surface site to move there, and its surface site does not leave active play until the attached Deep Mines site leaves active play.

card.name: Ninevet
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played keyed to a Swamp or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region and on a company moving with Port-on- River movement. If Terror from the Deeps is in play may also be played keyed to any Under-deeps site.

card.name: No Mouse Unnoticed
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. Balin may make a CP and (if still in play afterwards) look at a card placed on-guard at his company's site.

card.name: Norin
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 prowess against Men,Orcs and Trolls. Swordmaster may be played on him as if he were a sage.

card.name: Not Badly Off
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Playable if you have 10 P or more, and you receive any mp for Hoard Gathering or have stored at least 3 major items at Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold. Each of your Dwarves with a home site Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold receives +1 to his CP and +1 mind; if such a character now has 3 mind, he gives 1 character mp and does not cost any influence to control.

attr.value: Dwarves -- each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment; canceled if the company contains only Dwarves)

Discard a treasure item from the company during the site phase to search your play deck or discard pile for a Dwarf character who has this site as his home site: character may join the company (if enough influence is available to control him).
Dwarves -- 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains a Dwarf)*
*You may discard a treasure item from a covert company at this site to cancel the automatic-attack.

card.name: Oakenshield
card.text: Unique. Shield. Place this card on a manifestation of Thorin II if he is in play. +1 body to a maximum of 10. If on Thorin: tap: allow him to face a strike from an attack against his company regardless of the attack's normal abilities or his status. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take Block from your play deck (reshuffle) or discard pile into hand.

card.name: Old Enemies
card.text: Playable on a hero faction in play. Each overt company moving through the region containing the site where the faction was played, or a region adjacent to this one, faces an attack: same type as the faction, with a number of strikes equal to the faction’s mp value. Each strike has a prowess of 10 and body of 7. If the attack is defeated, discard the faction. Cannot be duplicated on a given faction.

card.name: Old Grudge
card.text: All Dwarves in play receive +1 prowess against Orcs, Trolls, Dragons and Drakes. Discard this card when any attack of this type is defeated by a company containing a least 1 Dwarf. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Orc-archers
card.text: Playable on an Orc attack with at least 4 strikes before strikes are assigned; does not count against the hazard limit. Each character faces a strike with 6 prowess; prowess against this strike cannot be modified, but character receives +1 prowess for each armor, helmet, and/or shield he bears and is able to use. Strikes from Orc Archers are never detainment, regardless of the company, site, region, or region-type on which they are played.

card.name: Orc-tortured
card.text: Playble on a character facing a strike from an Orc creature attack. If the strike is successful he is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Dark-hold [D], Shadow-hold [S], or Ruins & Lairs [R] in the same or adjacent region. At the start of his untap phase, make a body check for that character. Rescue-attacks (2): Orcs -- 2 strikes with 7 prowess, Orcs -- 1 strike with 10 prowess.

card.name: Orcish Marauders
card.text: Orcs. 2 strikes. If all strikes against a moving company are successful, tap the company's new site.

card.name: Origin of Stone
card.text: Command. Playable during the organization phase on a Dwarf-leader. Return all other command cards on target leader to your hand when this card is played. -2 to leader's EI (to a minimum of 0) and +1 prowess to all Dwarves in his company. +1 to your Under-deep movement rolls. You may return this card to your hand during your organization phase.

card.name: Out of Practise
card.text: Playable on a non-Hobbit character with 2 or more skills. Target character must attempt to move to a different site each turn or tap at the end of the organization phase. Tap another character in the same company during the organization phase to attempt to remove this card by making a roll: if the result is greater than 6, discard this card. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Pale Enchanted Gold
card.text: Hoard item. Treasure. Playable at any tapped or untapped site that contains a hoard. Discard this item to cancel a detainment attack by Elves or any one attack by Dwarves or Men against the company. Alternatively, discard to give +4 to an influence attempt against a Dwarf or Man character, ally or faction. Dragon- sickness may be played on the bearer of this item.

card.name: Pathfinder
card.text: +1 prowess against Orcs. -1 to all of his CC.-1 to his influence attempts. Cannot be duplicated on a company that does not contain a Dwarf-lord. tap: cancel a Drake, Orc or Troll attack keyed to Wilderness [w] (by type or name).

card.name: Pipe
card.text: Tap a non-Elf bearer during your end-of-turn phase and make a CC to bring one Longbottom Leaf, Old Toby, Pipe Weed or Smoke Rings from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). If bearer is Gandalf or Saruman you may take one of these cards to your hand instead.

card.name: Pipe Weed
card.text: Playable on a non-Elf character bearing a Pipe or with a home site in Eriador. Tap the character. You may look at the top 5 cards of your play deck and place them back on top in any order you choose. Character makes a CC (modified by -2 for Hobbits).

card.name: Pit Trap
card.text: Playable on-guard on an ancient Dwarf-ruin or any site with a Dwarf, Orc, or Trap automatic-attack. Reveal this card after the company has faced any automatic-attacks. Make a roll and add 2 for every scout in the company; if the result is less than 13, all characters with the same random number as the result face an attack: Trap -- 1 strike with 14 prowess; character receives +1 to his prowess if he bears any armor, helmet or shield. Any following body check is modified by +2.

card.name: Pity Mixed with Horror
card.text: Playable on a character. Make a CC for each corruption card played on the character; discard the corruption card after a successful CC. This card may also be played as a hazard.

card.name: Pocket Handkerchief
card.text: May not be included with a starting company unless it contains a Hobbit. Discard this item to cancel any effect that would return bearer to your hand (or would discard him, if bearer is a Hobbit.)

card.name: Profitable Trade
card.text: Place this card in your mp. Any unique non-aninal, non-overt, non-special faction you have in play may be placed with this card; if there is a faction under this card, any additional factions under this card must be playable at different sites in the same or an adjacent region (or in the same territory). This card is worth 2 mp if there are at least 3 factions of different race placed with it.

card.name: Promise of Treasure
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar Dwarf in your avatar's company (or in your starting company). +1 to his mind and +1 to his CP. Additionally, each of your Return to Old Dwellings in play is worth full mp. Discard this card if bearer transfers an item to another character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ravens of Northern Rhovanion
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Northern Rhovanion if the influence check is greater than 8. Standard Modifications: Roäc the Raven or Carc in the company (+3). Longbeard Dwarves and characters with home site Dale or Lake Town may play this faction at a tapped site. tap: give +2 to an influence check against any hero faction playable at sites in Northern Rhovanion, Southern Rhovanion, Dorwinion and Iron Hills.

card.name: Reconquest of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Playable if you have Halls of Khazad-dûm in play. Balrog players must use the minion version for Moria. Invert this card if one of your companies has defeated a manifestation of Balrog of Moria: it is worth 5 mp and all versions of Moria become a Free-hold [F] and a Dwarf-hold; replace all automatic-attacks with: Dwarves - 4 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies; cancelled against your companies). Discard this card if Halls of Khazad-dûm is not in play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Restored to Its Owner
card.text: Playable on a hero item that can be stored at a specific site or hold, or that has a race specific bonus or ability. Target item may be stored at the mentioned site(s), or at a hold of the race for which it gives a bonus or ability; if stored there it yields mp as if borne by a character of the hold's race (even to a Lord-player).

card.name: Return to Old Dwellings
card.text: Playble during the site phase on an ancient Dwarf-ruin with an automatic-attack. The company faces all automatic-attacks again, with +2 to prowess and strikes. Afterwards, opponent may search his sideboard, play deck or discard pile for a creature playable at the site, which attacks the company. None of these attacks may be cancelled. After these attacks, tap a Dwarf in the company or discard this card. The site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R]. All its automatic-attacks have their number of strikes reduced to one; discard any Invade Their Domain in play at the site. The site does not leave active play until this card is discarded. Discard this card if any opponent plays a minion faction or Invade Their Domain at the site. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: (1st) Traps -- 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. * Hero companies may discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company to lower the movement roll by 7.
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (11)*, The Drowning-deeps (11)*, The Under-caves (11)*
(1st) Traps -- 4 strikes with 10 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S]
Ancient Dwarf-ruin. * Hero companies may discard a Lost Knowledge card from the company to lower the movement roll by 7.

card.name: Shimmer of Hope
card.text: Playable on a company at an Under-deeps surface site which is a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D]. The company may either move an additional region when moving this turn, or you may discard as many corruption cards from characters in the company as there are strikes in the site's first automatic-attack. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Son of Dáin
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on Thorin III Stonehelm. He becomes a leader. +1 prowess against Men. If Dáin II has been eliminated, you may take this card from your sideboard to your hand and Thorin III Stonehelm receives +3 EI. If you are Dáin, Thorin III costs only 4 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Dáin or GI. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take a non- unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Fundin
card.text: Unique. Balin specific. Place this card on Balin if he is in play. If this is a starting stage card one of your starting minor items may be Share of the Treasure. tap: during your your end-of-turn phase (if on Balin) to take Return to Khazad-dûm, Lord of Dwarrowdelf or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Nain
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. Place this card on Dáin if he is in play. If this is a starting stage card one of your starting minor items may be Necklace of Silver and Pearls. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Dáin) to take Mining Settlement, Strength from the Ered Engrin or a non-unique Dwarf character from discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Son of Thráin
card.text: Unique. Thorin specific. Place this card on Thorin if in play. If this is a starting stage card one of your starting minor items may be Thrór's Map. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thorin) to take King under the Mountain, Master of Esgaroth, Old Predjudice or a non-unique Dwarf character from discard pile to hand.

card.name: Son of Thrór
card.text: Unique. Thráin specific. Place this card on Thráin if in play. If this is a starting stage card one of your starting minor items may be Lost Tome. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thráin) to take Last of the Seven, Lord of Dwarrowdelf, or Test of Fire from discard pile to hand.

card.name: Songs of the Old
card.text: Dwarf only. Untap all instrument items in the company. Additionally, you may take an instrument item playable at the site from your discard pile to your hand. If the Dwarf is at an Ancient Dwarf-ruin and bears an instrument, you may take any Dwarf specific resource from your discard pile to your hand instead.

card.name: Strength from the Ered Engrin
card.text: Unique. Dáin specific. If you have a Dwarf faction in play in Wilderland or The Northern Waste, any attacks from Ahunt Dragon manifestations against your companies in these territories receive -1 to strikes, prowess and body (after all other modifiers; to no minimum).

card.name: Swordmaster
card.text: Sage only. Playable on an untapped sage at an untapped site where Information is playable during site phase. Tap the site and the sage. Gives the sage warrior skill. If the sage is already a warrior, he can use 2weapons (both modifiers count). If he uses 2 weapons, he can not use a shield. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ta-Fa-Lisch
card.text: Undead. 3 strikes. Playable at any Ancient Dwarf-ruin or site containing a hoard. Unless the attack is cancelled or defeated, place this card with the site to which it was keyed. Place Ta-fa-lisch with the first character to play an item at the site. Character faces an attack from this creature at the start of every movement/hazard phase (as if a single character company, not counting against the hazard limit) until it is defeated or the item it was transfered with is stored or leaves play (then remove this card from the game).

card.name: Tarin
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. Agent. +1 prowess against Orcs and Elves. Agent only: May move to any Dwarf-hold (even if a Protected Lord-haven H). tap: discard an item stored at (or placed with) his current site (defender's choice).

card.name: Terror from the Deeps
card.text: Any Animal or Drake hazard creature playable keyed to Coastal Seas [c] may be played keyed to non-Desert regions adjacent to a Coastal Sea region (not adjacent to Mouths of the Anduin or Sea of Rhûn). Discard this card when such a creature played keyed to such a region (by name) is defeated, or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Back Door
card.text: On any company moving through a mountain region (or region adjacent) that contains an Orc-hold, one Orc hazard creature may be played for each non-scout, non-ranger character in the company, regardless of the company's site path and not counting against the hazard limit. Alternatively, if Doors of Night is in play, non-unique Orc creatures can be keyed to surface sites of any Under-deeps site.

attr.value: you may play Eagle Mounts here as if at Eagles Eyrie.
Animals. Bears - 2 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against a company containing a character with home site Beorn's House)
Lord of the Carrock may always be played at this site against an overt company regardless of any other cards played.
Blue Mountain Dwarf-hold (8), Remains of Thangorodrim (10), Ruins of Belegost (11), Ruins of Nogrod (11), The Under-vaults (9),
(1st) Drake -- 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to CoastalSeas [c].
Creatures keyed to Coastal Sea [c] may be keyed to this site.
Iron Hill Dwarf-hold (8), Barak-shathûr (8), Mines of Falek-dim (8), Ruins of Kheledkhizdín (8), The Cobalt-deeps (8), The Wind-deeps (9)
(1st) Drake -- 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any Dragon creature playable keyed to a site in Wilderland may be keyed to this site.

card.name: The Seven Houses
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable if you have in play at least 7 P and two non-Longbeard Dwarves of different descent (e.g. Firebeard, Ironfist, etc.). This card is worth 1 mp for each of your Dwarf factions in active play. Discard this card if the conditions to play it do not exist. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take a Dwarf faction or a non-unique Dwarf character from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: The Wind Throne (0), The Cobalt-deeps (5), The Rusted-deeps (9), The Under-leas (6)
(1st) Orcs (1st attack) -- 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic- attack 1 non- unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Shadow-hold [S]
Any Drake creature not playable keyed to a Desert [e] region may be keyed to this site.

card.name: This Cannot Be Borne!
card.text: Unique. Dwarf-lord only. Playable on your Dwarf-lord if you have in active play at least: 10 P, 1 Dwarf faction, The Seven Houses, and 5 Dwarf characters. +1 to his CP. Invert this card during the site phase at an ancient Dwarf-ruin if the company has eliminated a manifestation of a Dragon or Spawn creature while at the site that turn. If inverted, this card is worth 2 mp, and the next influence attempt made by your Lord against a Dwarf faction or character, or against an ally or item controlled by a Dwarf, is automatically successful; afterwards, place this card in your mp.

card.name: Thorin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thorin II. Longbeard. Leader. +2 EI against Dwarves. +3 prowess against Orcs, +1 prowess against Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thorin, you may keep 1 more card than normal in your hand if Reconquest of Khazad-dûm is in play. If King under the Mountain is played on him it is worth full mp, and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand.

card.name: Thorin III Stonehelm
card.text: Unique. Longbeard. +2 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. Any resource playable on a manifestation of Dáin II may also be played on Thorin III Stonehelm, if a manifestation of Dáin II is not in play.

card.name: Thráin
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Thráin II. Longbeard. Leader.+3 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Dragons, Drakes, Orcs and Trolls. -3 mp if eliminated. If you are Thráin, all treasure items played at The Lonely Mountain are worth full mp. If King under the Mountain is played on him it is worth full mp, and when at the site where the Dragon was defeated you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand. If Lord of Dwarrowdelf is played on him and he is at Moria you may keep 1 more card than normal in hand.

card.name: Threat of Many Feet
card.text: Does not count against the hazard limit. Against moving companies hazard creatures may be keyed to the site of origin (or the last site moved to this turn). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Three Guesseses
card.text: When making a riddling roll, make 3 rolls modified by -2 and choose any of the results to use. May also be played during opponent's site phase.

card.name: Thulin II
card.text: Unique. Ironfist. +2 EI against Dwarves. +2 prowess against Dwarves. If played as a hero character and not controlled by your avatar, make a roll during the untap phase; if the result is less than 5 discard Thulin II (one item may be transferred).

card.name: Tupór
card.text: Unique. Firebeard. +1 EI against Dwarves. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. Túpor is considered a sage for the purpose of riddling attempts; any resource played to modify a riddling roll may be taken to hand instead of discarding it after a non-successful riddling attempt.

card.name: Value Food and Cheer
card.text: Playable on a character. Tap character if untapped. +2 to any rolls to remove hazards played on target character (+5 if you discard a food item from the company).

card.name: War Mattock
card.text: Weapon. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess to a maximum of 8 (if bearer is a Dwarf, +3 prowess against Trolls to a maximum of 9). This item is worth 2 mp if played as a hero resource.

card.name: We Must Away!
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a moving company that contains at least 2 Dwarves. Untap all characters in the company. The company may move an additional region this turn (to a maximum of 6). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: What Have I Got in My Pocket?
card.graphics: What Have I Got in My Pocket.jpg
card.text: Riddling Attempt. Playable during the site phase on a character at the same site as one of opponent's companies. Tap the character. Opponent chooses a character from his company for this riddling attempt. Each player makes a riddling roll, modified by +2 if his character is a sage and by +1 if a Hobbit (re-roll ties). The player with the highest result wins: he names an item (not a unique item already in play) and the other player reveals his hand. If the item is revealed the winner may immediately play that item with the riddling character from hand or discard pile; loser discards the revealed item.

card.name: Without a Glance of Longing
card.text: Playable on a company during the organization phase. Any CC made by characters in the company this organization phase resulting from attempts to transfer or store items or events are modified by +2.

card.name: Wyrmsiege
card.text: Playable on a Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] (not in a Free- domain [f]). Place a non-unique Drake creature from hand with this card; the creature must be able to attack in regions in the site's site path or in the region containing the site. Companies at any version of this site must face an attack by the attached creature (considered keyed to the site) at the beginning of their site phase. At the end of the organization phase, a company at this site must make a roll and subtract one from the result for every non-warrior character it contains: if the result is less than 5, the company may not move this turn. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or when the attached creature is defeated. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.
